trans-unit.source: Data Input and Output
trans-unit.target: Data Input and Output

trans-unit.source: These modules provide tools for helping you read data into Azure Machine Learning Studio, and for saving your results to cloud data storage, including Azure blobs and Azure tables.
trans-unit.target: These modules provide tools for helping you read data into Azure Machine Learning Studio, and for saving your results to cloud data storage, including Azure blobs and Azure tables.

trans-unit.source: Read data from a Web URL, Hive query, Azure SQL database, Azure table, or Azure blob storage
trans-unit.target: Read data from a Web URL, Hive query, Azure SQL database, Azure table, or Azure blob storage

trans-unit.source: Load a collection of images from blob storage, for use in image classification tasks
trans-unit.target: Load a collection of images from blob storage, for use in image classification tasks

trans-unit.source: Write data out to an Azure table, Azure blob storage, Azure SQL database, or Hive query
trans-unit.target: Write data out to an Azure table, Azure blob storage, Azure SQL database, or Hive query

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning also supports directly uploading and downloading datasets from and to local files on your computer or on your network.
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning also supports directly uploading and downloading datasets from and to local files on your computer or on your network.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Upload existing data into an Azure Machine Learning experiment</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/machine-learning-walkthrough-2-upload-data/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Upload existing data into an Azure Machine Learning experiment</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/machine-learning-walkthrough-2-upload-data/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: These modules only move data from and to Azure Machine Learning Studio – they do not support filtering, casting, or other manipulation of the data during the read/write process.
trans-unit.target: These modules only move data from and to Azure Machine Learning Studio – they do not support filtering, casting, or other manipulation of the data during the read/write process.

trans-unit.source: For more information about ways to transform and filter your data in Azure Machine Learning Studio, see <link xlink:href="9c2844b8-7a4c-483b-848a-e35a27855716" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data Transformation</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about ways to transform and filter your data in Azure Machine Learning Studio, see <link xlink:href="9c2844b8-7a4c-483b-848a-e35a27855716" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data Transformation</link>.

trans-unit.source: Resources
trans-unit.target: Resources

trans-unit.source: The following articles on the Azure site provide information about the most common data scenarios in machine learning:
trans-unit.target: The following articles on the Azure site provide information about the most common data scenarios in machine learning:

trans-unit.source: Get Started
trans-unit.target: Get Started

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Machine Learning blog: The Cloud Data Science Process
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Machine Learning blog: The Cloud Data Science Process

trans-unit.source: Learn how to manage data for machine learning in the cloud, based on industry standards such as CRISP-DM.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to manage data for machine learning in the cloud, based on industry standards such as CRISP-DM.

trans-unit.source: Provides three end-to-end walkthroughs that integrate machine learning with cloud data solutions such as HDInsight and SQL Azure databases.
trans-unit.target: Provides three end-to-end walkthroughs that integrate machine learning with cloud data solutions such as HDInsight and SQL Azure databases.

trans-unit.source: Import your training data into Azure Machine Learning Studio
trans-unit.target: Import your training data into Azure Machine Learning Studio

trans-unit.source: Tutorial that covers the basics of getting your data into Azure and creating an experiment.
trans-unit.target: Tutorial that covers the basics of getting your data into Azure and creating an experiment.

trans-unit.source: Data preparation for machine learning using SSIS
trans-unit.target: Data preparation for machine learning using SSIS

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use ETL tools to integrate your data warehouse with Azure Machine Learning.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use ETL tools to integrate your data warehouse with Azure Machine Learning.

trans-unit.source: Advanced
trans-unit.target: Advanced

trans-unit.source: Access datasets with Python using the Azure Machine Learning Python client library
trans-unit.target: Access datasets with Python using the Azure Machine Learning Python client library

trans-unit.source: Learn how to install the Machine Learning Python client library and use it to access metadata and work with datasets.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to install the Machine Learning Python client library and use it to access metadata and work with datasets.

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Enables entering and editing small datasets by typing values
trans-unit.target: Enables entering and editing small datasets by typing values

trans-unit.source: Loads data from external sources on the web and from various forms of cloud-based storage in Azure such as tables, blobs, and SQL Server databases
trans-unit.target: Loads data from external sources on the web and from various forms of cloud-based storage in Azure such as tables, blobs, and SQL Server databases

trans-unit.source: Writes a dataset to web URLs or to various forms of cloud-based storage in Azure, such as tables, blobs, and SQL Server databases
trans-unit.target: Writes a dataset to web URLs or to various forms of cloud-based storage in Azure, such as tables, blobs, and SQL Server databases
